text: Bertil Fredrik Eugene Nordenskjöld (24 May 1891 in Lilla Mellösa, Sweden – 17 March 1975 in Stockholm, Sweden) was a Swedish football midfielder who played at the 1920 Summer Olympics. He made eight appearances (0 goals) for Sweden between 1910 and 1920.http://www.national-football- teams.com/player/49487/Bertil_Nordenskjoeld.html ==Honours== Djurgårdens IF * Svenska Mästerskapet:http://www.difarkivet.se/dif_sm_guld_seniorer.pdf 1912, 1915, 1917, 1920 ==References== Category:1891 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Association football midfielders Category:Swedish footballers Category:Swedish football managers Category:Djurgårdens IF Fotboll players Category:Djurgårdens IF Fotboll managers Category:Sweden international footballers Category:Olympic footballers of Sweden Category:Footballers at the 1920 Summer Olympics
title: Bertil Nordenskjöld
